item.title: Prosecutors in Luigi Mangione case can't seek death penalty, judge rules
item.description: Luigi Mangione, accused of murdering UnitedHeathcare CEO Brian Thompson, will not face the death penalty if convicted on federal charges, a judge rule...

item.title: Should you buy silver at Costco with the price rising? Pros and cons investors should consider
item.description: Silver prices have been rising quickly, but there are a few things to consider before buying the metal at Costco.

item.title: What Kevin Warsh as new Federal Reserve chair could mean for the economy
item.description: The president is turning to a former Fed official as his nominee to replace outgoing Chair Jerome Powell.

item.title: What we know about Kevin Warsh, Trump's pick to lead the Federal Reserve
item.description: Kevin Warsh is President Trump's pick to replace Jerome Powell as the chair of the Federal Reserve. CBS News' Weijia Jiang and Kelly O'Grady report.

item.title: Journalist Don Lemon arrested after protest at Minnesota church
item.description: Don Lemon was taken into custody by federal agents in Los Angeles, where had been covering the Grammy Awards, his attorney said.
